doc.title: Dante's Inferno 1906 San Francisco.
doc.plot: Dante's Inferno. 1906. San Francisco, tells the story of a vulnerable, guilt-ridden fireman who is driven to suicidal acts of bravery to save a new found love, San Francisco and come to grips with his tormented soul. Dante's Inferno. 1906. San Francisco, is the complete and dramatic saga of real and fictional citizens. Through their unabashed eyes project the innocent 24 hours before the 7,000 M.P.H. rupture and their merciless life and death struggles throughout the fiery holocaust. The tales of these fearless Americans weave in and out of Dante's journey. After four black days and with the annihilation at their doorsteps, Dante and the hearty citizens unite to courageously suffocate the blaze and launch their rebirth.
